theChaser:Shadow In Necklace.NAME: Shadow In Necklace
theChaser:Shadow In Necklace.FLAVOR: It is made of a small glass bottle of the abyssal darkness
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, apply #b2 #yTarget to a random enemy.

theChaser:Cloak Of Assassin.NAME: Cloak Of Assassin
theChaser:Cloak Of Assassin.FLAVOR: This cloak boasts excellent camouflage performance. It is a mass-product.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, #yHide for #b2 turns.

theChaser:R-B0-7.NAME: R-B0-7
theChaser:R-B0-7.FLAVOR: It is a dangerous secret weapon that has only a fatal effect from a famous drug.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, enemies have debuff lose #b5 #yHP.

theChaser:Broken Ticker.NAME: Broken Ticker
theChaser:Broken Ticker.FLAVOR: It is already broken, but it is said that the ticking sound of the clock hands can still be heard.

theChaser:Scoch Stone.NAME: Scoch Stone
theChaser:Scoch Stone.FLAVOR: How do you polish it with this strange stone?

theChaser:Letter Of Request.NAME: Letter Of Request
theChaser:Letter Of Request.FLAVOR: It is a request from unknown client.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, apply #b3 #yTarget to ALL enemies.

theChaser:Shadow In Mask.NAME: Shadow In Mask
theChaser:Shadow In Mask.FLAVOR: Abyssal shadow always hides behind the mask.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #pShadow #pIn #pNecklace. At the start of turn, apply #b1 #yTarget to ALL enemies and attack #yTarget once.

theChaser:Pocket Knife.NAME: Pocket Knife
theChaser:Pocket Knife.FLAVOR: A portable knife used to cut ropes.

theChaser:Acid Solution.NAME: Acid Solution
theChaser:Acid Solution.FLAVOR: No one uses it for sprinkling on anyone, right?
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have #yWeak , your attack applies #b1 #yWeak to the enemy. If you have #yFrail, your attack removes all block of the enemy.

theChaser:Box Cutter.NAME: Box Cutter
theChaser:Box Cutter.FLAVOR: It's a very peculiar sword. The purpose is unknown.

theChaser:Rusty Helmet.NAME: Rusty Helmet
theChaser:Rusty Helmet.FLAVOR: It is an old helmet used in wars of the past.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, apply #b1 #yUnfortified to ALL enemies.
